abstract: Apple’s shares fell 6 percent after AT&T said the early surge of iPhone buyers starting service on its network was smaller than some analysts had anticipated.
snippet: Apple’s shares fell 6 percent after AT&T said the early surge of iPhone buyers starting service on its network was smaller than some analysts had anticipated.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, July 24 — Apple’s shares slumped 6 percent on Tuesday after AT&T said the early surge of iPhone buyers starting service on its network was smaller than some analysts had anticipated.

abstract: Apple threw some tidbits to investors. But it won’t say how much money it gets from AT&T for the iPhone.
snippet: Apple threw some tidbits to investors. But it won’t say how much money it gets from AT&T for the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: Listening to Apple executives on their conference call with analysts this afternoon was like watching the Democratic presidential candidates respond to questions submitted by YouTube users: Whatever was asked, the answer always came from a carefully prepared script.

headline.main: A Partial Lesson in iPhone Economics
